00023 #ifndef UNIQUEID_H
00024 #define UNIQUEID_H
00025 
00026 #include "pstdint.h"
00027 
00028 #define UNIQUEID_USAGE_DEBUG
00029 
00030 // useful for trying to detect uninitialized usage of the class.. 
00031 #ifdef UNIQUEID_USAGE_DEBUG
00032         #define UNIQUEID_DBG(x) x
00033         #define UNIQUEID_IS_INIT assert(is_init);
00034         #define UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR ,is_init(true)
00035         #define UNIQUEID_DEF_CONSTRUCTOR : is_init(false)
00036         
00037 #else
00038         #define UNIQUEID_DBG(x)
00039         #define UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00040         #define UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR
00041         #define UNIQUEID_DEF_CONSTRUCTOR
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 
00083 // default to 6
00084 #ifndef UNIQUEID_SZ
00085         #define UNIQUEID_SZ 6
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 
00089 #if UNIQUEID_SZ == 4
00090 
00091         typedef uint32_t UniqueId;
00092 
00093 #else
00094 
00095         template <typename high_type>
00096         struct UniqueIdT {
00097                 typedef UniqueIdT<high_type> this_type;
00098                 
00099                 uint32_t        lo;
00100                 high_type       hi;
00101                 UNIQUEID_DBG( bool is_init; )
00102         
00103                 bool IsNull() const { 
00104                         UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00105                         return !lo && !hi; 
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 // useful operators
00109                 bool operator > (const this_type & x) const { UNIQUEID_IS_INIT return hi == x.hi ? lo > x.lo : hi > x.hi; }
00110                 bool operator < (const this_type & x) const { UNIQUEID_IS_INIT return hi == x.hi ? lo < x.lo : hi < x.hi; }
00111                 bool operator ==(const this_type & x) const { UNIQUEID_IS_INIT return lo == x.lo && hi == x.hi; }
00112                 bool operator !=(const this_type & x) const { UNIQUEID_IS_INIT return lo != x.lo || hi != x.hi; }
00113                 
00114                 // increment
00115                 this_type& operator++ ()
00116                 {       
00117                         UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00118                         if (!++lo)
00119                                 hi++;
00120                         return *this;
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 // conversion operator
00124                 operator uint64_t () const
00125                 {
00126                         UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00127                         uint64_t ret = ((uint64_t) hi) << 32;
00128                         ret |= (uint64_t) lo;
00129                         return ret;
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 UniqueIdT() 
00133                         UNIQUEID_DEF_CONSTRUCTOR 
00134                 {}
00135 
00136                 UniqueIdT(uint64_t val) :
00137                         lo((uint32_t)val),
00138                         hi((high_type)(val >> 32))
00139                         UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR
00140                 {}
00141 
00142                 UniqueIdT(uint32_t l, high_type h) : 
00143                         lo(l), hi(h) 
00144                         UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR
00145                 {}
00146                 
00148                 UniqueIdT(const unsigned char * const buffer) :
00149                         DESERIALIZE(uint32_t, 0, lo),
00150                         DESERIALIZE(high_type, sizeof(uint32_t), hi)
00151                         UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR
00152                 {}
00153                 
00155                 void Serialize(unsigned char * buffer) const
00156                 {
00157                         UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00158                         SERIALIZE(uint32_t, 0, lo);
00159                         SERIALIZE(high_type, sizeof(uint32_t), hi);
00160                 }
00161                 
00163                 enum { record_size = sizeof(uint32_t) + sizeof(high_type) };
00164         };
00165         
00166         
00167         #if UNIQUEID_SZ == 5
00168                 typedef UniqueIdT<uint8_t> UniqueId;
00169         #elif UNIQUEID_SZ == 6
00170                 typedef UniqueIdT<uint16_t> UniqueId;
00171         #elif UNIQUEID_SZ == 8
00172                 //typedef UniqueIdT<uint32_t> UniqueId;
00173                 typedef uint64_t                        UniqueId;
00174         #else
00175                 #error "Undefined magic unique id size"
00176         #endif
00177 
00178 #endif
00179 
00180 #undef UNIQUEID_DBG
00181 #undef UNIQUEID_IS_INIT
00182 #undef UNIQUEID_DBG_CONSTRUCTOR
00183 #undef UNIQUEID_DEF_CONSTRUCTOR
00184 
00185 #endif
